verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> revealed <S%G5319><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the disciples <S%G3101><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Tiberias. <S%G5085><s%> <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G5319><s%> revealed himself this way. <S%G3779><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Cana <S%G2580><s%> in Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sons of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> others <S%G243><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> together. <S%G3674><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "I <S%G5217><s%>'m going fishing. <S%G232><s%>" They told <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "We <S%G2249><s%> are also <S%G2532><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> you. <S%G4671><s%>" They immediately <S%G2117><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat. <S%G4143><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> night, <S%G3571><s%> they caught <S%G4084><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

But when <S%G1161><s%> day <S%G4405><s%> had already <S%G2235><s%> come, <S%G1096><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the beach, <S%G123><s%> yet <S%G3305><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Children, <S%G3813><s%> have you <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3361><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> to eat? <S%G4371><s%>" They answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "No. <S%G3756><s%>"

He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Cast <S%G906><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> side <S%G3313><s%> of the boat, <S%G4143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you will find <S%G2147><s%> some. <S%G906><s%>" They cast it therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G2089><s%> they weren't <S%G2480><s%> <S%G3756><s%> able <S%G2480><s%> to draw <S%G1670><s%> it <S%G846><s%> in for <S%G575><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of fish. <S%G2486><s%>

That <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "It <S%G2076><s%>'s the Lord! <S%G2962><s%>" So when <S%G3767><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> he wrapped <S%G1241><s%> his coat <S%G1903><s%> around him <S%G1063><s%> (for he was <S%G2258><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%>), and <S%G2532><s%> threw <S%G906><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came in <S%G2064><s%> the little boat <S%G4142><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> far <S%G3112><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the land, <S%G1093><s%> but <S%G235><s%> <S%G5613><s%> about <S%G575><s%> two hundred <S%G1250><s%> cubits <S%G4083><s%> away <S%G4951><s%>), dragging the net <S%G1350><s%> full of fish. <S%G2486><s%>

So <S%G5613><s%> when <S%G3767><s%> they got out <S%G576><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the land, <S%G1093><s%> they saw <S%G991><s%> a fire of coals <S%G439><s%> there, <S%G2749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fish <S%G3795><s%> laid on <S%G1945><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and bread. <S%G740><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Bring <S%G5342><s%> some of <S%G575><s%> the fish <S%G3795><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have <S%G4084><s%> just <S%G3568><s%> caught. <S%G4084><s%>"

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> went up, <S%G305><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> land, <S%G1093><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of great <S%G3173><s%> fish, <S%G2486><s%> one hundred <S%G1540><s%> fifty-three; <S%G4004><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> even though there were <S%G5607><s%> so many, <S%G5118><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> wasn't <S%G4977><s%> <S%G3756><s%> torn. <S%G4977><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Come <S%G1205><s%> and eat breakfast. <S%G709><s%>" <S%G1161><s%> None <S%G3762><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> dared <S%G5111><s%> inquire <S%G1833><s%> of him, <S%G846><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you? <S%G4771><s%>" knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> the bread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> it to them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the fish <S%G3795><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> the third time <S%G5154><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was revealed <S%G5319><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> after he had risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they had eaten their breakfast, <S%G709><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jonah, <S%G2495><s%> do you <S%G25><s%> love me <S%G3165><s%> more than <S%G4119><s%> these? <S%G5130><s%>" He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I have affection <S%G5368><s%> for you. <S%G4571><s%>" He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Feed <S%G1006><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> lambs. <S%G5130><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> a second time, <S%G1208><s%> "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jonah, <S%G2495><s%> do you <S%G25><s%> love me? <S%G3165><s%>" He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I have affection <S%G5368><s%> for you. <S%G4571><s%>" He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Tend <S%G4165><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep. <S%G4263><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> the third time, <S%G5154><s%> "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jonah, <S%G2495><s%> do you <S%G5368><s%> have affection for me? <S%G3165><s%>" Peter <S%G4074><s%> was grieved <S%G3076><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he asked <S%G2036><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the third time, <S%G5154><s%> "Do you <S%G5368><s%> have affection for me? <S%G3165><s%>" He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> everything. <S%G3956><s%> You <S%G4771><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I have affection <S%G5368><s%> for you. <S%G4571><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Feed <S%G1006><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

Most <S%G281><s%> certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you were <S%G2258><s%> young, <S%G3501><s%> you dressed <S%G2224><s%> yourself, <S%G4572><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walked where <S%G3699><s%> you wanted <S%G2309><s%> to. <S%G1161><s%> But when <S%G3752><s%> you are old, <S%G1095><s%> you will stretch out <S%G1614><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hands, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> will dress <S%G2224><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> carry <S%G5342><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> you don't <S%G3756><s%> want to go. <S%G2309><s%>"

Now he <S%G2036><s%> said this, <S%G5124><s%> signifying <S%G4591><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> kind of death <S%G2288><s%> he would glorify <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> When <S%G2532><s%> he had said <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>"

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> turning around, <S%G1994><s%> saw <S%G991><s%> a disciple <S%G3101><s%> following. <S%G190><s%> This was the disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sincerely loved, <S%G25><s%> the one <S%G1909><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> had also <S%G2532><s%> leaned <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>' breast <S%G4738><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the supper <S%G1173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> asked, <S%G2036><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> going to betray You? <S%G4571><s%>"
Peter <S%G4074><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G5126><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> about this man? <S%G3778><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> I desire that <S%G2309><s%> he <S%G846><s%> stay <S%G3306><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that to <S%G4314><s%> you? <S%G4571><s%> You <S%G4771><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>"

This <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the brothers, <S%G80><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> wouldn't <S%G599><s%> <S%G3756><s%> die. <S%G599><s%> Yet <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3754><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> that he wouldn't <S%G599><s%> <S%G3756><s%> die, <S%G599><s%> but, <S%G235><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> I desire that <S%G2309><s%> he <S%G846><s%> stay <S%G3306><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that to <S%G4314><s%> you? <S%G4571><s%>"

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the disciple <S%G3101><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> testifies <S%G3140><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> these things, <S%G5130><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%> We <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true. <S%G227><s%>

There <S%G1161><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> which <S%G3745><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they would all <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> be written, <S%G1125><s%> I suppose that <S%G3633><s%> even the world <S%G2889><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> wouldn't <S%G5562><s%> <S%G3761><s%> have room <S%G5562><s%> for the books <S%G975><s%> that would be written. <S%G1125><s%>
